description: After long-term different boron and aluminum treatment, 2D electrophoresis and mass spectrum were conducted to investigate different proteiomic profile in Citrus sinensis roots samples.

keywords.name: submitter keyword
keywords.value: Boron-toxicity • Citrus grandis • Citrus sinensis • 2-DE • Proteome • Roots

modifications.name: No PTMs are included in the dataset

terms.name: Reference
terms.value: Sang W, Huang ZR, Yang LT, Guo P, Ye X, Chen LS. Effects of High Toxic Boron Concentration on Protein Profiles in Roots of Two Citrus Species Differing in Boron-Tolerance Revealed by a 2-DE Based MS Approach. Front Plant Sci. 2017 8:180

terms.name: taxonomy: scientific name
terms.value: Citrus sinensis (Sweet orange) (Citrus aurantium var. sinensis)

title: Boron-toxicity-induced alterations of protein profiles in roots of two citrus species differing in boron-tolerance revealed by 2-DE
